Second Year Binder

This was the beginning of my second year in the Design Communication program. This folder contains more work from the previous year, alonside new and exciting projects.

Windows

Second year was primarily focused on architecture and buildings. It ranged from window sizes, to roofs.

Custom Door

As well as working with windows and roofs, we also worked on doors. An example is creating my own custom door.

Roof Project

The final project of the year was to create a physical recreation of a certain roof form. Mine was freeform, so I had to really work hard to create something unique.
